title: Want to add a few Cycle 460s
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Want to add a few Cycle 460s
posts.post_content: I've started to dabble in these a bit.  Lately I've bought an SGC 30 for $150, and a PSA 2.5 for $200.  If there are any others out there in that general price range (or higher for HOFers of course) please let me know.  Thanks!

[quote name="LukeLyon" post=1608054]I've started to dabble in these a bit.  Lately I've bought an SGC 30 for $150, and a PSA 2.5 for $200.  If there are any others out there in that general price range (or higher for HOFers of course) please let me know.  Thanks![/QUOTE]

Luke,
I have a Hugh Jennings in an SGC 60...
